articles.title: Doctors find more cases of 'COVID toes' in dermatological registry. Here's what they learned. - USA TODAY
articles.description: Doctors have compiled a registry of skin conditions associated with COVID-19 where COVID toes represent nearly half the cases. Here's what they learned.
articles.content:
The CDC released six new possible symptoms of coronavirus, which include muscle pain and headache.
USA TODAY
Doctors are learning more about COVID-19s newest and oddest skin manifestation, dubbed COVID toes, as the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention… [+3929 chars]

articles.description: Aerodynamic analysis of SARS-CoV-2 in two Wuhan hospitals
articles.content: The ongoing COVID-19 outbreak has spread rapidly on a global scale. While the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 via human respiratory droplets and direct contact is clear, the potential for aerosol transmission is poorly understood13. This study investigated the aer… [+1247 chars]
